document.full_text: france's first lady carla bruni said on tuesday she had canceled a red-carpet appearance at the cannes film festival because of "personal reasons," feeding rumors that she might be pregnant.
document.title: french first lady skips cannes amid pregnancy rumor
lines_and_colors: france's first lady carla bruni said on tuesday she had canceled a red-carpet appearance at the cannes film festival because of "personal reasons," feeding rumors that she might be pregnant.
